reviews.review_text: Our company has been with Metro Communications for over 8 years now.  The Metro team has always been very quick to respond to any issues we may have with the phones or the system. Many times issues can be resolved remotely, but if an on-site service call is required they come out right away to get us back up and running. I would highly recommend Metro Communications!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Impressions In Print, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Upgraded our office phones with Metro Communications.  Shailesh  was super helpful in explaining our options, and functions we can implement.  Installation was a breeze.

Have been working with Shailesh over the past 5 years, nothing but good things to say about him and the services of his company provides. I have referred his service to many of my clients, and everybody has been very happy over this long period of time. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Muta Digital, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Our company has been working with Metro Communications for quite a few years. Shailesh has always been great to work with and very helpful in helping us develop new systems to help improve our efficiencies. The team is also very quick to respond to any queries or help troubleshoot any issues. Highly recommend them!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Dr. Michael Butler, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: We have been dealing with Metro Communications Inc for our phone services for many years now. They have always provide excellent support whenever needed. Their staff is skilled and professional and their service is very prompt. Great work Metro Communications!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Pacific Cabs / White Rock South Surrey Taxi, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: We ve used MetroCentrex for over a decade, and its services have allowed us to connect staff and clients across four countries. Without the MetroCentrex communications technology, our travel agency could not assist clients from hundreds of cities. The costs are many times less than having multiple independent contracts with telephone companies. MetroCentrex consolidates everything using your existing computers and mobile devices. You have a single point of contact when new lines and services are needed anywhere in the world. Billing and services are consolidated, and requests are dealt with promptly. The MetroCentrex service is tailored to your specific needs. We started very small, and Metrocentrex allowed us to grow one line and country at a time. I can t recommend them more highly because there is always someone at MetroCentrex to help when needed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Zunzun / Cuba Education Tours, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Metro Communications is always quick to respond and their staff is helpful and friendly. Would recommend them to any business in need of phone services!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Oakwyn Realty, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: They work hard to deliver a solution that works for you. We have been working with their system for over 2 years and with a virtual team having a VOIP system was a must.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Consulting Resource Group, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Weve been in business with Metro Communications for years now, and they have never let us down. Customer service is always quick and efficient, and you really do get great value for what you pay. Great and consistently friendly communication with their knowledgeable staff, reliable service, and I would happily recommend them to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Integral Artists/Kirk Talent, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh and the Metro Communications team provides exceptional customer service and has been there from the beginning to help us in setting up the communication links for our business and to make our office work efficiently. No request is too mundane or too big to be outside the scope of their services -- and its always delivered with a smile! Very happy with their services and would highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Rizwan, and assure you, and your team at Backs In Action, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh and his team at Metro Communications are awesome.   I work with IT company and we get Metro Communications to deal with phone systems and installations as well as some of work load when we are too busy.    They are so good that when we recommend Metro to one of our customers to deal with their phone system issue or new roll out, we end looking good too! I highly recommend them
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Edriss, and assure you of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: I used to resell PBX phone systems as an add on to our networking and IT business, then I met Shailesh.  We met through a common client and Ive never resold a phone box again.  Metro now handles all of my phone requests with innovative solutions that squash any competitions pricing, versatility and service.  If you want professional phone services Metro is your solution.  I highly recommend their team for any phone requirements no matter how big or small, legacy to cutting edge.  I have 100s of handsets now under Metro across many companies and look forward to building more and more with Shailesh.  So far not one complaint!  Now you dont hear that often. Keep up the fantastic service team! Mark Ford - Partner SME Network Group.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you so very much Mark, and assure you and your team at SME Computers, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh and the team at Metro were very attentive to our needs and provided excellent service. We initially had a few issues with our phones but he was able to remedy the situation with care and efficiency.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: From our entire team at Metro Communications, we sincerely thank you and assure your team at Mountain West Studios, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: The company has been with Metro Communications for many years, and Shailesh and his team have always provided the best of service and advice. We have grown significantly over the last few years and Shailesh is always able to assist us with getting new phones hooked up fast and effeciently. Provides excellent quick service whenever required. A great company to work with and I would recommend them to anyone who asked me.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Michael, and assure you, and your team at Marcon Metal Fab, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh and his team did an excellent job of installing our new phone system seamlessly without any downtime for us at all.  Since then hes personally followed up and made sure everything was absolutely perfect.  We highly recommend Metro to any business looking to upgrade their phones!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Andrew, and assure you and your team at Newport Group CPA, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Thank you Shailesh for always being so helpful and kind. We are extremely happy and pleased with your services. Great customer service, very prompt and easy to work with. I highly recommend Metro Communications to all out there who are looking for the telecommunication services.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Bestway Tours & Safaris, and assure you and your team our very best service & support at all times!

reviews.review_text: I have been a client of Metro Communications Inc. for the past 3 years and I love their services.  They are amazing in number of ways: 1. My staff and I love their technology. 2. Our communication between staff and offices are much easier. 3. The price is much better compare to the bigger companies like Telus and Shaw. 4. My communication guy is a phone call away.  when we have a problem which is once every blue moon he is on top of it. I recommend Metro Communication to all the business that they care about their telecommunication.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Max, & assure you, and your team at The Art Of Smile, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Great company to work with, we run multiple phones across Canada and Asia as we have employees around the world, Shailesh and his company have connected us and saved us alot of  $$$ and have come through with every feature we have asked for. Customer service is top notch and any problem is dealt with promptly. Would Recommend to Metro to anybody and this partnership has been great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Parts Avatar, and assure you and your team, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: We  first employed the services of Metro Communications in June last year and we have nothing but good things to say about the company and its people. Shailesh and his team are professional, responsive to our business needs and always deliver. They have been many times Metro Communications have risen beyond the call of duty to ensure we are comfortable with their systems and technology.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Plakilla, and assure you. and your team at XL Flooring/Ez Lay Flooring, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: We started a relationship with Metro Communications almost exactly 2 years ago. From the very beginning, Shailesh clearly explained our phone system and did not try to encourage us to replace our old antiquated system for a more expensive one. He told us that since we had a pending office move, our old system was adequate to suit our needs. We appreciated the fair and honest feedback. Now, two years later, we have a shiny new system. Again, Shailesh has trained us on how to use and manage the new system, always being totally reliable and quick to respond to questions. We are very happy with the service from Metro Communications. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Darlene, and assure you, and your team at Solus Decor, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: As a I.T. Consultant working with many clients, we recommended metro communications for all of our client looking for a VOIP solution. Shailesh my rep did an exceptional job. Not only did they deliver exception service during installation and training, they also looked after my clients providing all the service and support they needed long after the installation. I received very positive feed back from my clients, and will recommend Shailesh and his team to anyone I work with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you William, and assure you, and your team at LXT, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Our office has used Metro Communications for some time now and have never been disappointed! The team is always very quick to respond and assist with any troubleshooting or general phone needs. They are quick, efficient and most importantly, very kind!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Emily, and assure you and your team at Landa Global our very best service & support at all times!

reviews.review_text: Ive worked with Metro Communications and our rep Shailesh for about two years now and our company has been with them even longer than that. Its a great service and whenever I have questions or concerns about it they are always very prompt and professional with assisting.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Braden, and assure you and your team at Vitaeris our very best service & support at all times!

reviews.review_text: Super responsive if there are any issues, and able to tailor our system to our needs quickly.  All installs have been super quick as well.  You get exactly what you are told youre getting.  Has a quick hookup with Shaw as well for adding/changing services.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you & assure you of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh helped us with installing a new phone system at our new office.  He doesn t try to push the most expensive system but he makes his recommendations after considering all the factors.  He was reliable and helpful in our dealings with our new phone/internet provider.  He also went out of his way to give me helpful suggestions when it wasn t expected.  I would recommend him to anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Sonya, and assure you, and your team at Solus Decor, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: We have used Metro Communications for over 10 years for Voip and phone services for our organization. Shailesh has provided the highest level of service and is always there when we need him.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank the entire team at Sussex Insurance at all locations that we service.  Assuring you once again of our very best service at all times!!

reviews.review_text: Metro has been a great asset to our company.  Awesome customer service, sales and install.   Shailesh has been a pleasure to work with.  Guaranteed, happy customers we are!  Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Lisa, and assure you, and your team at Impressions In Print/Hotshot Coffee Sleeves, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: We are very pleased with Metro Communications Inc. the prompt service and expertise had met our expectations. The staff are very knowledgeable and helpful. They are an email away! Certainly over all it cut our expense with our telephone bills.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Wedad...and assure you, and your team at Marlin Travels Downtown our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: We had a very pleasant experience with Metro Communications. Shailesh was available to answer all of our questions right away and to make any changes to our account immediately. Metro Communications made our move a breeze, I recommend using Metro Communications.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Kim, and assure you, and your team at HKM, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: The owner and employees were very knowledgeable. The customer service was outstanding. After the installation, the owner personally called me to make sure everything was working well. Further, he even had a whatsapp video conference with me to go over some stuff. This was the best customer service experience. You guys are great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Pervez, and assure you and your team at PNV Insurance Services, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Amazing customer service. The team at Metro always is prompt to respond to us and solve any issues we have encountered. Excellent service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: From our entire team at Metro Communications, we sincerely thank you and assure your team, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh set us up with the best and clear IP phones weve had to date.  Support and knowledge 10/10.  He always was available when there were questions and if not returned calls within a timely manner.  Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Bryan, and assure you, and your team at Coast2Coast Wheels, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: World-class customer service. You have a full team of professionals taking care of your business in a very competitive and fast moving market. I have reject all other offers from competitors as Im 100% sure we are being taken care of by the very best in town bar none.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We thank you Behrad...and assure you, and your team at Fit-To-Train our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: Amazing service and product . Every once in a while you run across a business that keeps its promises and cares about your business as much as you do. This is one of those amazing businesses. If you have a call center you need Metro Communications. If you have a business that depends on customer service and communications this is your go to
reviews.response_from_owner_text: As our 50th reviewer on Google we couldnt have expected better! :-) We sincerely thank you Alanna, and assure your team at The Seed Company, the very best of our service at all times!

reviews.review_text: Easily the most helpful, efficient & attentive service Ive ever had in a business environment from a service provider of any kind. Always same day (often same hour) solutions to any inquiry. Onsite visits and training are no issue for them. They have a customer first attitude and you are never left wondering where are they or what to do. 100% recommend them to anyone for your telecommunications provider.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you ! We assure you, and your team at Sussex Insurance, of our best services at all times!

reviews.review_text: I have been dealing with Shailesh for many, many years. Always excellent  and prompt service.  I would highly recommend Metro Communications to anyone!

reviews.review_text: Shailesh run a real professional company. He goes out of his way to make sure everything is perfect, and he is well educated on the equipment he sells or leases. Been with him approximately 3 years now. Brad Hargreaves Avyonce spas

reviews.review_text: I ve been using their services for about a year. They are very responsive, and so easy to do business with. I haven t had any glitch on my line since I started working with them.
